RateGasAggregator.mainSelect: select v.cncon, --0 v.cpod, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(v.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), --3 to_char(v.d_valido_al,'yyyymmdd'), --4 -- CASE WHEN A.OPERANDO='GRSCSPECIA' THEN to_char (add_months(last_day(v.cdsti),12)-1,'yyyymmdd')ELSE data_validita_al END CASE , --4 GET_GAS_VALORI_TARIFART(A.OPERANDO,v.ctar1,l.indccom),--5 GET_GAS_PREZZO_KONDIGR(A.OPERANDO,v.ctar1,l.indccom,v.d_valido_dal),--6 b.id_operando --7 from DBI_USER.IFC_SAP_ANAGRCONTRGAS v, gas_prodotto_operando a, gas_anagrafica_operandi b, Dbi_User.Ifc_Sap_Anagrindirizzi_pr g , v_Indirizzi l, Dbi_User.Ifc_Sap_Punti_Fornitura ee where a.ctar1=v.ctar1 AND v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr=g.pr and v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr IN(SELECT CNCON FROM z_test_contratti) and a.operando = b.operando AND l.Indprog = g.Indprog and v.Dbi_Original_Key_Pr=ee.dbi_punto_key and tipo = 'RATE TYPE' and to_char(v.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd') > '20090701' group by v.cncon, --0 v.cncon, --1 a.operando, --2 to_char(v.d_valido_dal,'yyyymmdd'), --3 to_char(v.d_valido_al,'yyyymmdd'), --4 GET_GAS_VALORI_TARIFART(A.OPERANDO,v.ctar1,l.indccom),--5 GET_GAS_PREZZO_KONDIGR(A.OPERANDO,v.ctar1,l.indccom,v.d_valido_dal),--6 b.id_operando --7 order by v.cncon

RateGasExtractor.mainSelect: SELECT GAS_FACTS_KEY.LEGACY||GAS_facts_f_rate_type.operand||GAS_facts_v_rate_type.ab, --0 GAS_FACTS_KEY.TIPO,--1 GAS_FACTS_KEY.ANLAGE, --2 GAS_FACTS_KEY.BIS, --3 GAS_facts_f_rate_type.legacy||GAS_facts_f_rate_type.operand||GAS_facts_v_rate_type.ab, --4 GAS_facts_f_rate_type.tipo, --5 GAS_facts_f_rate_type.operand, --6 GAS_facts_f_rate_type.saison, --7 GAS_facts_f_rate_type.prog, --8 GAS_facts_v_rate_type.legacy||GAS_facts_f_rate_type.operand||GAS_facts_v_rate_type.ab, --9 GAS_facts_v_rate_type.tipo, --10 GAS_facts_v_rate_type.ab, --11 GAS_facts_v_rate_type.bis, --12 GAS_facts_v_rate_type.tarifart, --13 GAS_facts_v_rate_type.kondigr, --14 GAS_facts_v_rate_type.prog --15 from GAS_facts_key,fGAS_acts_f_rate_type,GAS_facts_v_rate_type where GAS_facts_key.legacy = GAS_facts_f_rate_type.legacy and GAS_facts_v_rate_type.legacy=GAS_facts_key.legacy and GAS_facts_f_rate_type.legacy=GAS_facts_v_rate_type.legacy and GAS_facts_f_rate_type.prog=GAS_facts_v_rate_type.prog order by GAS_facts_f_rate_type.prog
